plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that they enjoy reading fantasy, science fiction, and mystery genres. The writing style can be descriptive and immersive, with a focus on character development and world-building. The length of the books can vary, but they tend to prefer longer works that offer a rich and detailed story. The topic can be anything from alternate realities to historical events to philosophical questions.
